summary: **Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes** is a 2024 sci-fi action movie, the fourth in the reboot series. Directed by Wes Ball, it follows chimp hunter Noa and human Mae on a journey to decide the future of apes and humans. The film is set many years after the previous installment, *War for the Planet of the Apes*. Development started in 2019, with casting in 2022 and filming in Sydney. It received positive reviews and made over $397 million worldwide.
title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
